name: KnowingTeaching-FlashBriefingforTeachers
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: In these briefings for K-12 teachers, experienced teacher, teacher educator, author and podcaster about education, Seán Delaney, shares ideas about all aspects of the work of teaching.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
